The ad uses a clip of Dr: Anthony Fauci praising federal public health officials, but it makes it seem like Fauci was personally complimenting President Trump. Fauci himself says the ad lifted his words "out of context."
Fauci has been critical of President Tru: s handling of the pandemic, including his criticism of some states for opening too quickly and his mixed messages on wearing masks.
The ad begins with images of a masked Tr: implying that Trump successfully tackled the virus head-on.
The ad includes a clip of Fauci saying: I can't imagine that ... anybody could be doing more," but it fails to mention that Fauci was not specifically referring to Trump and that he never endorsed any political candidate.
